briefdescription.para: Writes the alpha function in GLSL.

parameterdescription.para: true for opaque nodes, false for transparent ones.

briefdescription.para: Encode HDR color to a 32 bit uint. Alpha is 1 bit + 7 bit HDR remapping.
Encode specified normal (normalized) into 32 bits uint. Each axis of the normal is encoded into 9 bits (1 for the sign/ 8 for the value).
3D array index to flattened 1D array index
Flattened array index to 3D array index.
